Forward Indicators of Economic Cycles (Momentum of Flows)

CoT sector flow & momentum: economic cycle proxies.

As of 2025-10-14

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The "Other" sector's average 4-week flow (`avg_flow_4w`) declined from 0.4889 in early July to -0.4492 by mid-August.
  • Flows have since recovered, nearing neutral at -0.0104 by October 14, following a period of strong positive flows in September.
  • Contrarian flow share for this sector peaked at 0.2056 in late July, then decreased significantly to 0.0991 by mid-September.
  • Trend-confirming flows (`trend_confirm_share`) reached a recent high of 0.4027 in late September.

Technical Summary:

  • Flow momentum (`avg_flow_4w_mom`) for the "Other" sector turned positive in early September (+0.2685), signaling improving flows consistent with an acceleration phase.
  • This momentum dipped in late September (-0.2577) then stabilised by October 14 (+0.0083).
  • A lower `contrarian_flow_share` of 0.0991 in mid-September suggested reduced unwind risk.
  • However, it increased slightly to 0.1221 by October 14, suggesting a minor uptick in reversal signals.

References:

  • Economic_Cycle_Proxies_Flow_Momentum, latest data 2025-10-14.
  • Conclusions were primarily influenced by the `avg_flow_4w_mom` and `contrarian_flow_share` data points.
  • Public datasets on global macroeconomic indicators would improve future analysis.
  • Equity sector performance data would also enhance understanding of this "Other" category.
